bodyText: Hi, I am Yogesh Sharma a code enthusiast. I'm a Full-Stack developer with 7+ years of experience in developing web and Windows applications using C#, ASP.NET, MVC, t-SQL, React-JS, Typescript and JavaScript. I'm passionate about using technology to solve problems and deliver quality results.

Experiences.jobProfile: Worked as a Full Stack Developer on Web and Windows applications such as [Windows service, console application] using Microsoft technologies like - Classic ASP, ASP.NET, c#, t-SQL, Crystal Reports, HTML, Javascript and jQuery.
rr: Communicated with clients for requirement gathering and provided ongoing support.
Supervised junior team members and delegated tasks within the team.
Successfully resolved production issues related to violation payments and critical application functionality.
Implemented new features for multiple clients and independently developed and set up new clients.
Implemented and maintained automated citation notices and report generation for clients using Crystal Report tools.
Developed and fixed payment logic for clients and handled other payment related issues.
Established consolidated client data metrics for over 50 clients, facilitating accurate project revenue calculation for audit purposes for the company's R&D department.
Automated manual processes by developing C# executables and web applications.
Managed client databases, including server performance, SQL job monitoring, and firewall issues, for optimal application performance.
Provided training to juniors for the application and offered guidance to them.
Performed manual testing across the entire application.

Experiences.jobProfile: Worked as a Full Stack Developer on Web and Windows applications [Windows service, console application] using Microsoft technologies [C#, ASP.NET, MVC/Entity Framework, Classic ASP, Javascript, jQuery, HTML And CSS].
rr: Communicated with business stakeholders to gather requirements and ensure alignment with project.
Played a key role in the enhancement team, responsible for implementing new features and enhancements to the PartSurfer application.
Participated in data center application migration activities to ensure seamless transitions and minimal disruptions
Managed staging and production code deployments, ensuring smooth transitions between environments.
Maintained source code in GitHub, facilitating version control and collaboration among team members.
Modified the application to ensure compliance with HPE's regulatory standards, demonstrating a commitment to quality and adherence to industry regulations

Experiences.jobProfile: Working as a Full Stack Developer on Web and Windows applications using C#, ASP.NET, VB.NET, MVC/Entity Framework, Classic ASP, React JS, Node JS, Typescript, Javascript, jQuery, HTML and CSS {Bootstrap/Tailwind}.
rr: Communicated with business stakeholders/Users and gathered requirements for various IT projects.
Designed and develop new products/application based on user requirement.
Implemented new features and enhancements for assigned projects as part of the development team.
Maintained database for clients, including server performance, SQL jobs and firewall issues.

Experiences.jobProfile: Working as a Full Stack Developer on Web and Windows applications using C#, ASP.NET, VB.NET, MVC/Entity Framework, Classic ASP, React JS, Node JS, Typescript, Javascript, jQuery, HTML and CSS {Bootstrap/Tailwind}.

Educations.instituteName: Centre for Development of Advanced Computing (C-DAC)
Educations.instituteAddress: C-DAC Knowledge Park Sadanandanagar, Bennigana Halli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560038
Educations.course: Post Graduate Diploma in Advanced Computing (PG-DAC)

Projects.name: SiPh Report
Projects.description: The SiPh Report system is an advanced and centralized solution that offers comprehensive perceptivities into the wafer, die, engine and module level parameter analysis, defect and yield tracking throughout the silicon-photonic manufacturing process. It provides end-to-end traceability from wafers to modules.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the SiPh Report project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop/Maintain this report tool for engineers in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: EnggDataPortal
Projects.description: The Engineering Data Portal, developed by Broadcom, is a powerful data analysis tool designed to provide detailed engineering test results obtained during the semiconductor manufacturing process to Contract Manufacturers (CM). This tool provides access to specific product results for designated sites and facilities, enabling them to analyze and optimize their manufacturing processes. By leveraging these insights, engineers can identify recurring failures, proactively implement countermeasures, and enhance productivity and product quality.
Projects.roleDescription: As a Senior Engineer on the Engineering Data Portal project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop this powerful data analysis tool for Contract Manufacturers (CM) in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: Oven Slot Tracking
Projects.description: The Oven-Slot Tracking application is a tool designed to track the positioning of motherboards within an oven tray. This application offers detailed information of each slot of the tray which is crucial for effective motherboard tracking. Through detailed analysis of slot data, engineers can easily identify the status [Active Or Idle] of motherboard. This application offers visual representation of motherboard data to track and menage motherboards.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the Oven Slot Tracking project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop this powerful tracking tool for engineers in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: Shipment Data Extractor
Projects.description: The Shipment Data Extractor is a web tool that brings together wafer details from different sources and performs multiple checks on data to ensure accuracy and creates a list of wafers ready for shipment. Users rely on this list to send wafers to customer.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the Shipment Data Extractor project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop this data consolidation tool for users in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: Mellanox Dashboard
Projects.description: The Mellanox Dashboard web application enables users to monitor wafer data across multiple databases efficiently. Users can generate reports for lists of wafers, and the application displays database load results, highlighting any missing data issues with clear messages. This functionality helps users to identify and address missing data issues, ensuring data consistency and availability across all configured systems.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the Mellanox Dashboard project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop this Mellanox Dashboard tool for users in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: DataPack Extractor
Projects.description: The Datapack Extractor is a web application which can retrieve specific part details from a SQL database in the specific excel template. The generated Excel file is then transfer to an AWS S3 bucket for storage and future utilization.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the DataPack Extractor project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop this data extractor tool for users in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: Defect Tracking
Projects.description: The Defect Tracking web application is designed to aid users in analyzing the wafer and die information. On the dashboard page user can select the specific wafer based on site, facility device, product, and defect code. and with their parameters users are presented with details statistics, 3d slices, and wafer charts, providing a detailed overview of each die's information. This application also provides an option to upload wafer die information in cav format. also, users can download detailed reports for any specific defect code or device for further analysis.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the Defect Tracking project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to Maintain this Defect Tracking tool for engineers in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: Die Tracer
Projects.description: The Die Tracer application is a backend tool designed to monitor the die of wafers and identify any discrepancies compared to the ASM Data. Utilizing a Flask API powered by a Python model, it employs Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to extract the die ID from die images. Then it cross-references this die ID with the ASM database entries. In case of any mismatches, engineers are notified via email, including the mismatched die image and other die-related information. additionally, the application consolidates wafer die information, simplifying the tracking of failed, mismatched, and OK dies.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the Die Tracer project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to Maintain this Die Tracer tool for engineers in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: ISS Shipment Status
Projects.description: The ISS Shipment Status Web application is developed to assist users in tracking component shipment information. It retrieves current shipment information from a consolidated shipment file and displays this data in the monitor, using the Airport font style. This allows the shipment department to stay updated on the total components shipped to customers with ease.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the ISS Shipment Status project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop this ISS Shipment Status web application for users in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: Scrap Wafer remover
Projects.description: The Scrap Wafer Remover tool provide functionality for users to eliminate scrap wafers part from wafer images. Users can select the coordinates of the scrap wafer part from wafer images and then specify which parts of the scrap wafer to remove from the wafer image.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the Scrap Wafer remover project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop this Scrap Wafer remover tool for users in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: XML Generator
Projects.description: The XML Generator application is a handy tool that converts requested SQL data into the required XML format. It then transfers this XML data to the Oracle System for further processing.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the XML Generator project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to maintain this ETL tool for users in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: SIPM
Projects.description: The SIPM application is a tool that retrieves compressed files from FTP/SFTP servers. It then extracts the data from these files and transfers it to a specified location for additional processing. Additionally, it sends out email reports for each file transfer, ensuring users are kept informed of the file transfer.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the SIPM project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to develop this file transfer tool for users in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: Wafer Qual File Processor
Projects.description: The Wafer Quality File Processor is a backend tool designed to seamlessly load wafer test result data into the database. This enables users to leverage the loaded data for their analysis, contributing to an enhanced overall product quality.
Projects.roleDescription: Working As a Senior Engineer on the Wafer Quality File Processor project at Broadcom INC. I've been tasked to Maintain this WQ File Processor tool for engineers in the semiconductor manufacturing domain. by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance and user satisfaction.

Projects.name: PartSurfer
Projects.description: PartSurfer is a web application designed for field engineers to quickly access part availability and component details for various products. Engineers can search for parts or serial numbers and view matching spare parts, adding them to their cart for purchase through the enterprise Part Store (WWEPS) website.
Projects.roleDescription: IT Developer/Engineer 2 with Hewlett Packard Enterprise GlobalSoft Private Limited, contributing to the development and enhancement of the PartSurfer web application. Adept at communication, problem-solving, and project management, with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions that meet business objectives

Projects.name: Global iReturns
Projects.description: iReturns is a disposition tool to manage the reverse logistics of parts or materials returned to HPE. The tool retrieves data from SAP regarding the received materials and determines the optimal disposition method, handling both defective and good materials.
Projects.roleDescription: IT Developer/Engineer 2 with Hewlett Packard Enterprise GlobalSoft Private Limited, contributing to the development and implementation of the Global iReturns disposition tool. Proficient in a wide range of technologies including C#, ASP.NET, T-SQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery, with a focus on optimizing reverse logistics processes for returned parts and materials.

Projects.name: Easitool
Projects.description: Easitool is a web-based tool to manage the workflow and escalations of global sales orders and part status. The tool serves as a centralized platform for issue tracking and history, ensuring consistent information across organizations throughout the delivery process. Additionally, Easitool facilitates collaboration between teams through its sub-ticket capability, enhancing communication and efficiency. By connecting live to the ordering systems (SAP), the tool provides real-time part inventory availability without requiring direct system access.
Projects.roleDescription: IT Developer/Engineer 2 with Hewlett Packard Enterprise GlobalSoft Private Limited, contributing to the development and maintenance of the Easitool web-based tool. Proficient in C#, ASP.NET, Classic ASP, T-SQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions that streamline workflow and enhance collaboration for global sales orders and part status management.

Projects.name: Cite-Web
Projects.description: Public Safety Solution is an automated photo enforcement system designed to address traffic violations, including infractions such as Red Light, Speed, and Radar Enforcement. The cite-net application captures all violation and processor approves violation to next queue in cite-web application. Cite-Web provides county officers with citation details, then the officer processes these citations to multiple queues (Like: Verify, DMV Verify, Police Approval) to generate the citation notice for the violators. Then violators can pay the fine or can appeal for court hearing. In the court, judges can review appeal citation details in the Cite-Web Court queue, providing violators with the opportunity to prove their innocence or settle fines.
Projects.roleDescription: Dedicated Application Development & Support Engineer 1 with extensive experience in developing and maintaining enterprise-level applications. Proficient in client communication, issue resolution, and project coordination, with a focus on delivering high-quality solutions and ensuring client satisfaction

Projects.name: ReSale
Projects.description: The Resale web application is designed to help users to sell there secondhand items where bidder can bid amount for the product and highest bid customer gets the product.
Projects.roleDescription: Worked as a individual contributor for the Resale project where i have developed many modules of this application also by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance.

Projects.name: Personal Accountant Portal
Projects.description: The Personal Accountant Web Portal is designed to help users to manage there personal fiances. It enables users to store there daily expenses and allow then the view there monthly expense report also enables them to segregate the monthly report based on expense category.
Projects.roleDescription: Worked as a individual contributor for the Personal Accountant Web Portal  where i have developed many modules of this application also by Leveraging the technical skill i have successfully implemented new features , optimized performance and addressing critical issues to ensure optimal application performance.
